shri lankawa ha sancharaka pakisthana kandayama athara tharaga pahakin samanwitha jathyanthara ekdina krikat tharagamalawe palamu tharagaya ada diwa rathriye pallekale jathyanthara krikat kridanganayedi pawathwe.depila athara pasugiyada pawathi wissayi20 dwithwa tharagamalawa tharaga 1 – 1k lesin samawa awasan wiya.shri lankawa ha pakisthanaya athara ada pawathwenne 128 wani jathyanthara ekdina tharagayayi.

uthure idam himikam oppu kala nohaki 80%ta parchas 20 thamayi; amathi hemakumara thahawuru karayi (2009 juli 15) uthure sahana gammanawala wasiyanta parchas 20 bagin laba dena bawata idam ha idam sanwardhana amathi jiwan kumarathunga wisin kara athi prakashaya pilibanda ada dinamina puwathpathata adahas dakwana krushikarma sanwardhana amathya hemakumara nanayakkara pawasanne "uthure idakadamwalata himikam kiyu himikam thibunu siyalu dena ma thama thamange bim pa්radesha wala padinchi karawana" bawayi.
